alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 12:13PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Seminole, southern Lake and western Orange Counties through 100 PM EST... At 1213 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Apopka to 11 miles east of Dade City to near Zephyrhills North. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Apopka, Ocoee, Winter Garden and Eustis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for east central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole; Southern Lake County
